A form for general feedback is below. For other comments and questions:

  • If you are experiencing any issues with the library's electronic resources, please email lib-ejournal@virginia.edu.
  • If you want the library to purchase a particular title for our collection, please use the Purchase Recommendation form.
  • If you need assistance with other scholarship-related issues, or prefer to use email rather than the form below, please email lib-scholarship@virginia.edu.
